# Makefile — Build Automation

A Makefile lets you define repeatable commands (targets). Below is a minimal Makefile content. Save this to a file named `Makefile` (no extension) in the repo root.

```{bash}
cat > Makefile <<'MAKE'
.PHONY: env data book clean

env:
	python -m pip install --upgrade pip
	pip install -r requirements.txt

data:
	python scripts/make_synth_data.py
    python scripts/build_features.py

book:
	quarto render book

clean:
	rm -rf book/_site book/_freeze data/processed

MAKE

# Show Makefile
sed -n '1,200p' Makefile
